greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Simple self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: after zero, list each block of A213709(n) numbers in reverse order, from A218600(n) to A213710(n-1).
comment: This permutation can be used to map between the sequences A179016 and A218616. E.g. A179016(n) = A218616(a(n)) and vice versa: A218616(n) = A179016(a(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8727
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 10 2012
